ValidationRule.description: This Validation Rule informs users of the blank fields they must complete prior to updating a Load Moving as Empty Case to Closed Status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(ISPICKVAL(NS_InteractionReason__c,'Load Moving as Empty') , ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_Closed') , NS_Created_using_Quick_Case__c <> True, OR( ISBLANK(NS_ErrorLocation__c) ,
ISBLANK(NS_NewWaybill__c) , ISBLANK(NS_ReasonForError__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete Error Location, New Waybill, and Reason for Error prior to closing the Case.
